InvestTrack Tutorial

Welcome to the InvestTrack Tutorial â€” a step-by-step guide that walks you through building, testing, and deploying your project.

Learning Objectives

By completing this tutorial, you will:

  • Set up and run a React app using Vite
  • Write and execute unit tests using Vitest
  • Configure Continuous Integration (CI) with GitHub Actions
  • Deploy your app online using GitHub Pages
  • Practice real-world development tasks (tests, routes, automation)

Prerequisites

Before you begin:

  • Install Node.js
  • Install Git
  • Have a GitHub account

  4. Deployment
  5. Practice Exercises
